function.name: control_light
function.description: Turn a light on or off, or change brightness.

entity_id.description: The specific entity_id of the light (e.g. light.kitchen_main)

function.name: set_temperature
function.description: Set the target temperature for a climate device.

entity_id.description: The entity_id of the thermostat (e.g. climate.living_room)

function.name: play_music
function.description: Searches for and plays music using Music Assistant. Targets a specific room or speaker.

query.description: The song, artist, album, or playlist name.

room.description: The room where the music should play (e.g., 'Wohnzimmer'). If the user doesn't specify, use the room they are currently in.

function.name: stop_music
function.description: Stops or pauses music playback in a specific room or speaker.

room.description: The room where the music should be stopped (e.g., 'Wohnzimmer'). If the user doesn't specify, use the room they are currently in.

function.name: activate_scene
function.description: Activates a predefined smart home scene (e.g., for cozy lighting, sleeping, waking up, or leaving home). A scene can also be triggered by e.g. Ich gehe schlafen for the scene.schlafen

entity_id.description: The exact entity_id of the scene to activate.

function.name: manage_volume
function.description: Adjust the local speaker volume of the voice assistant.

function.name: set_timer
function.description: Start a countdown timer on the local device.

duration_seconds.description: The duration of the timer in seconds. Convert minutes or hours to seconds.

function.name: next_track
function.description: Skips to the next song in a specific room or speaker.

room.description: The room where the music should be skipped (e.g., 'Wohnzimmer'). If the user doesn't specify, use the room they are currently in.

function.name: previous_track
function.description: Goes back to the previous song in a specific room or speaker.

room.description: The room where the music should go back (e.g., 'Wohnzimmer'). If the user doesn't specify, use the room they are currently in.

function.name: queue_music
function.description: Searches for and adds music to the end of the queue using Music Assistant. Targets a specific room or speaker.

query.description: The song, artist, album, or playlist name to add to the queue.

room.description: The room where the music should be queued (e.g., 'Wohnzimmer'). If the user doesn't specify, use the room they are currently in.

function.name: resume_music
function.description: Resumes or unpauses music playback in a specific room or speaker.

room.description: The room where the music should be resumed (e.g., 'Wohnzimmer'). If the user doesn't specify, use the room they are currently in.

function.name: whats_playing
function.description: Checks what song, artist, or media is currently playing in a specific room.

room.description: The room to check for playing music (e.g., 'Wohnzimmer'). If the user doesn't specify, use the room they are currently in.

function.name: clear_queue
function.description: Clears the current music queue or playlist in a specific room or speaker.

room.description: The room where the music queue should be cleared (e.g., 'Wohnzimmer'). If the user doesn't specify, use the room they are currently in.
